name: Tom's 4x4
description:
Prove your offroad skills to meet daring obstacles and solve physics puzzles.
Fine tune your vehicle performance to meet the track's demands.
Tom's 4x4 will immerse you in a challenging offroad world.

Features:
20 challenging levels.
7 offroad vehicles.
9 Upgrades per vehicle.
Awesome graphics.
Super realistic physics!

Adjustable Upgrades:
Front Spring
Front Damper
Rear Spring
Rear Damper
Front Wheel Radius
Rear Wheel Radius
Suspension
Engine Torque Curce
Transmission

This is the game you've been waiting for.
Say goodbye to your free time, Tom's 4x4 is a ride you will never forget!

Check out the trailer of our upcoming sequel, Tom's 4x4: Mountain Park! Coming summer 2014!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ekkZt-TGq2A
